name: Flash Me
description:
Flash Me v.1.0.0

This is a simple, limitless memory game. Actually I've made this to enhance my attention to moving objects, to read fast and develop my eyes muscles. 

  •  You should follow the lightning boxes
  •  Keep the sequence in your memory. 
  •  Then, you perform the sequence on these boxes. 
  •  You can play it just with your mouse. 

Enjoy! 

What will be in the next version?

  • You can keep saved your best score
  • Better animation flows
